Package org.voltdb

Main package for VoltDB contains public interfaces.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SQLStmt A simple wrapper of a parameterized SQL statement.
VoltProcedure Wraps the stored procedure object created by the user with metadata available at runtime.
VoltTable The primary representation of a result set (of tuples) or a temporary table in VoltDB.
VoltTable.ColumnInfo Object that represents the name and schema for a VoltTable column.
VoltTableRow Represents the interface to a row in a VoltTable result set.
 

Enum Summary
VoltType Represents a type in a VoltDB Stored Procedure or VoltTable.
 

Exception Summary
VoltProcedure.VoltAbortException Thrown from a stored procedure to indicate to VoltDB that the procedure should be aborted and rolled back.
 

Annotation Types Summary
ProcInfo Annotates a stored procedure with information needed by the stored procedure compiler.
 

Package org.voltdb Description

Main package for VoltDB contains public interfaces.
